mapper.select: select id, param_type as paramType, param_key as paramKey, param_score as paramScore, created_time as createdTime from qunar_black_param where created_time > #{beginTime} and #{endTime} >= created_time and param_type = #{paramType}
mapper.delete: delete from qunar_black_param where #{endTime} > created_time and param_type = #{paramType}
mapper.insert: insert into ctrip_black_ip(ip,channel, score,created_time) values(#{ip}, #{channel}, #{score}, #{createdTime}) on duplicate key update score = #{score}, created_time = #{createdTime}
